original_text: Eat the Feast of Flat Bread every year. Eat bread that has no yeast in it for seven days, as I commanded you. Do this on the right day in the month of Abib. That is the month that you came out from Egypt.
korean_text: 너는 무교절을 지키되 내가 네게 명령한 대로 아빕월 그 절기에 이레 동안 무교병을 먹으라 이는 네가 아빕월에 애굽에서 나왔음이니라

sentences.original_text: Eat the Feast of Flat Bread every year
Eat bread that has no yeast in it for seven days
sentences.korean_translation: 칠 일 동안 누룩 없는 떡을 먹으라

sentences.original_text: Do this on the right day
that you came out from Egypt
